sense.def: Illness Sign identical with zhang 脹 , distension. An uncomfortable feeling of being filled to bursting in the abdominal region. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 6: 感應丸，治積食停滯， 脾胃作脹 , “The ‘pills that elicit a reaction’ cure food accumulation and stagnation. The spleen and stomach distend ”. Zuo zhong 作腫 , to develop a swelling [6]

Illness Sign identical with zhong 腫 , to swell; swelling. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 22: 治石發熱，熱結 生腫堅起。始作腫，宜下之 , “To cure an effusion of heat resulting from [the consumption of this] mineral, with heat nodes generating swelling with hardness. When the swelling is about to develop , it is advisable to purge it with a discharge”.
